base-domain\n\n# class DomainError exten.name:
base-domain

BaseFactory.name: BaseFactory
BaseFactory.description:
Base factory class of DDD pattern.

create instance of model

the parent "Base" class just simply gives a @getFacade() method.

BaseModel.name: BaseModel
BaseModel.description:
Base model class of DDD pattern.

the parent "Base" class just simply gives a @getFacade() method.

BaseRepository.name: BaseRepository
BaseRepository.description:
Base repository class of DDD pattern.
Responsible for perpetuation of models.
BaseRepository has a client, which access to data resource (RDB, NoSQL, memory, etc...)

the parent "Base" class just simply gives a @getFacade() method.

Base.name: Base
Base.description:
parent class of model, factory and repository.

gives them @getFacade() method.

DomainError.name: DomainError
DomainError.module:
base-domain

# class DomainError extends Error  # not worked.
# see http://stackoverflow.com/questions/19422145/property-in-subclass-of-error-not-set

Facade.name: Facade
Facade.description:
Facade class of DDD pattern.

- create instance of factories
- create instance of repositories

ResourceClientInterface.name: ResourceClientInterface
ResourceClientInterface.description:
interface of client accessing to resource.
Used in BaseRepository

LoopBackClient in loopback-promised package implements this interface.

see https://github.com/CureApp/loopback-promised

TYPES.name: TYPES
TYPES.description:
define various data type, including model and array of models

key: typeName (String)
value: type (String|Function)

classitems.description: get model class this factory handles
classitems.name: getModelClass

classitems.description:
create instance of model class by plain object

for each prop, values are set by Model#set(prop, value)
classitems.name: createFromObject

classitems.description:
key-value pair representing typeName - type

use for definition of @properties for each extender
classitems.name: TYPES

classitems.description:
key-value pair representing property's name - type of the model

    firstName    : @TYPES.STRING
    lastName     : @TYPES.STRING
    age          : @TYPES.NUMBER
    registeredAt : @TYPES.DATE
    team         : @TYPES.MODEL 'team'
    hobbies      : @TYPES.MODELS 'hobby'
    info         : @TYPES.ANY

see types.coffee for full options.
classitems.name: properties

classitems.description:
get key-value pair representing property's name - type info of the model
if prop name is given, returns the info
classitems.name: getPropertyInfo

classitems.description:
get prop name whose type is CREATED_AT
notice: only one prop should be enrolled to CREATED_AT
classitems.name: getPropOfCreatedAt

classitems.description:
get prop name whose type is UPDATED_AT
notice: only one prop should be enrolled to UPDATED_AT
classitems.name: getPropOfUpdatedAt

classitems.description: get list of properties which contains relational model
classitems.name: getModelProps

classitems.description: synchronize relation columns and relationId columns
classitems.name: updateRelationIds

params.name: prop
params.description: property name of the related model

params.name: prop
params.description: property name of the related models

params.name: prop
params.description: property name of the related models

classitems.description:
create plain object without relational entities
descendants of Entity are removed, but not descendants of BaseModel
descendants of Entity in descendants of BaseModel are removed ( = recursive)
classitems.name: toPlainObject

classitems.description: include all relational models if not set
classitems.name: includeAll

props.name: recursive
props.description: recursively include models or not. unstable.

classitems.description: assert given prop is model prop
classitems.name: assertSubModelProp

classitems.description: return if Model is subclass of Entity
classitems.name: isSubClassOfEntity

classitems.description:
client accessing to data resource (RDB, NoSQL, memory, etc...)

mock object is input by default.
Extenders must set this property to achieve perpetuation
classitems.name: client

classitems.description: get model class this factory handles
classitems.name: getModelClass

classitems.description: Update or insert a model instance
classitems.name: save

return.description: entity (the same instance from input, if entity given,)

classitems.description: Find all model instances that match params
classitems.name: query

classitems.description: Find one model instance that matches params, Same as query, but limited to one result
classitems.name: singleQuery

classitems.description: Destroy the given entity (which must have "id" value)
classitems.name: delete

params.name: id
params.description: id of the entity to update

params.name: data
params.description: key-value pair to update (notice: this must not be instance of Entity)

classitems.description:
add createdAt, updatedAt to given data
- createdAt will not be overriden if already set.
- updatedAt will be overriden for each time
classitems.name: appendTimeStamp

classitems.description:
get facade

the implementation is in Facade#requre()
classitems.name: getFacade

classitems.description:
reason of the error
alphanumeric string (without space) is recommended,
classitems.name: reason

base-domain

props.description: director(y|ies) to have fixture files. /data, /tsvs should be included in the directory.
